reference.title: CODESET values for import and export procedures
reference.shortdesc: Import and export procedures accept arguments to specify codeset values. You can specify the codeset (character encoding) for import and export procedures to override the system default.

section.p: For a table that shows a sample of the character encodings supported by the Java Development Kit, see "derby.ui.codeset property" in the . To review the complete list of character encodings, refer to your Java documentation.
